languages.text: {n}Вокс-система издает болезненный треск, словно от ломающихся и перемалываемых костей.{/n} "Я молюсь, чтобы {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g} дал нам мудрость искоренить разделившие нас диалектические заблуждения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вокс-система издает болезненный треск, словно от ломающихся и перемалываемых костей.{/n} "Я молюсь, чтобы {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссия{/g} дал нам мудрость искоренить разделившие нас диалектические заблуждения".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}The vox-system emits a painful crunch, like the sound of snapping bone.{/n} "I pray that the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants us wisdom to overcome the dialectic differences that divide us."

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵系统发出了一声痛苦的脆响，仿佛骨头碎裂的声音。{/n}“我祈祷{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}赐予我们智慧，克服辩证分歧带来的分裂。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-system emits a painful crunch, like the sound of snapping bone.{/n} "I pray that the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants us wisdom to overcome the dialectic differences that divide us."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵系统发出了一声痛苦的脆响，仿佛骨头碎裂的声音。{/n}“我祈祷{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}赐予我们智慧，克服辩证分歧带来的分裂。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El sistema de vocos emite crujido doloroso, como el sonido de un hueso al romperse.{/n} «Ruego que el {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} nos conceda la sabiduría para superar las diferencias dialécticas que nos dividen».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-system emits a painful crunch, like the sound of snapping bone.{/n} "I pray that the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants us wisdom to overcome the dialectic differences that divide us."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sistema de vocos emite crujido doloroso, como el sonido de un hueso al romperse.{/n} «Ruego que el {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} nos conceda la sabiduría para superar las diferencias dialécticas que nos dividen».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}ヴォクス・システムが、骨が折れるような痛々しい音を発する。{/n}「私たちを分断している弁証の相違を克服するために、{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}が私たちに知恵を授けてくださることを祈ろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-system emits a painful crunch, like the sound of snapping bone.{/n} "I pray that the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants us wisdom to overcome the dialectic differences that divide us."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクス・システムが、骨が折れるような痛々しい音を発する。{/n}「私たちを分断している弁証の相違を克服するために、{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}が私たちに知恵を授けてくださることを祈ろう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das Voxsystem gibt ein schmerzhaftes Knacken aus, wie das Geräusch von brechenden Knochen.{/n} "Ich bete, dass der {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} uns die Weisheit gewährt, die dialektischen Differenzen zu überwinden, die uns entzweien."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-system emits a painful crunch, like the sound of snapping bone.{/n} "I pray that the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants us wisdom to overcome the dialectic differences that divide us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Voxsystem gibt ein schmerzhaftes Knacken aus, wie das Geräusch von brechenden Knochen.{/n} "Ich bete, dass der {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} uns die Weisheit gewährt, die dialektischen Differenzen zu überwinden, die uns entzweien."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le système-vox émet un craquement douloureux, comme celui d'un os qui se brise.{/n} « Je prie l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} pour qu'il nous accorde la sagesse et nous permette de surmonter les différences dialectiques qui nous séparent. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-system emits a painful crunch, like the sound of snapping bone.{/n} "I pray that the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants us wisdom to overcome the dialectic differences that divide us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le système-vox émet un craquement douloureux, comme celui d'un os qui se brise.{/n} « Je prie l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g} pour qu'il nous accorde la sagesse et nous permette de surmonter les différences dialectiques qui nous séparent. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The vox-system emits a painful crunch, like the sound of snapping bone.{/n} "I pray that the Omnissiah grants us wisdom to overcome the dialectic differences that divide us."

languages.text: {n}Voks sisteminden acı dolu, kemik kırılma sesini andıran bir çıtırtı geliyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g} bize, bizi birbirimizden ayıran diyalekt farklılıklarını aşmamızı sağlayacak kadar bilgelik bahşetsin diye dua ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-system emits a painful crunch, like the sound of snapping bone.{/n} "I pray that the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} grants us wisdom to overcome the dialectic differences that divide us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks sisteminden, kemik kırılma sesini andıran, acı dolu bir çıtırtı geliyor.{/n} "Dualarım, {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g} bize, bizi birbirimizden ayıran diyalekt farklılıklarını aşmamızı sağlayacak kadar bilgelik bahşetsin diyedir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
